name: Lightless World
description:
An evil corporate factory, led by an evil boss who calls himself: "The lord of light", have stolen the sun and locked your friends in prisons! go and defeat the evil boss and retrieve peace and happiness to your world!

Controls:

A & D - to walk.

SPACE - to jump.

some objects can be interacted with by using the left click on the mouse.

Esc/escape key - to exit the game.

 softwares used:

Unity

Krita

Bosca Ceoil
